member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectAlignment
member.summary: Represents the alignment portion of the SVG preserveAspectRatio attribute.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectAlignment.None
member.summary: The alignment is set to SVG's 'none' value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectAlignment.XMinYMin
member.summary: The alignment is set to SVG's 'xMinYMin' value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectAlignment.XMidYMin
member.summary: The alignment is set to SVG's 'xMidYMin' value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectAlignment.XMaxYMin
member.summary: The alignment is set to SVG's 'xMaxYMin' value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectAlignment.XMinYMid
member.summary: The alignment is set to SVG's 'xMinYMid' value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectAlignment.XMidYMid
member.summary: The alignment is set to SVG's 'xMidYMid' value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectAlignment.XMaxYMid
member.summary: The alignment is set to SVG's 'xMaxYMid' value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectAlignment.XMinYMax
member.summary: The alignment is set to SVG's 'xMinYMax' value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectAlignment.XMidYMax
member.summary: The alignment is set to SVG's 'xMidYMax' value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectAlignment.XMaxYMax
member.summary: The alignment is set to SVG's 'xMaxYMax' value.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectScaling
member.summary: Represents the meetOrSlice portion of the SVG preserveAspectRatio attribute.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectScaling.Meet
member.summary: Scale the viewBox up as much as possible such that the entire viewBox is visible within the viewport.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgAspectScaling.Slice
member.summary: Scale the viewBox down as much as possible such that the entire viewport is covered by the viewBox.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgDisplay
member.summary: Specifies a value for the SVG display property.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgDisplay.Inline
member.summary: The element uses the default display behavior.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgDisplay.None
member.summary: The element and all children are not rendered directly.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgLengthUnits
member.summary: Specifies the units for an SVG length.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgLengthUnits.Number
member.summary: The length is unitless.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgLengthUnits.Percentage
member.summary: The length is a percentage value.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgOverflow
member.summary: Specifies a value for the SVG overflow property.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgOverflow.DoNotClipToViewport
member.summary: The element is not clipped to its viewport.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgOverflow.ClipToViewport
member.summary: The element is clipped to its viewport.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintAttribute
member.summary: Object describing an SVG fill or stroke value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintAttribute.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the CanvasSvgPaintAttribute.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintAttribute.Clone
member.summary: Creates a clone of this attribute value.
member.remarks: On creation, the cloned attribute is not set on any element.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintAttribute.GetElement
member.summary: Returns the element on which this attribute is set.
member.remarks: Returns null if the attribute is not set on any element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintAttribute.Device
member.summary: Gets the device with which this attribute is associated.
member.remarks: Attributes can only be assigned to elements which use the same device.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintAttribute.PaintType
member.summary: Specifies the paint type (i.e., policy by which color and URI are considered as sources) for this attribute.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintAttribute.Id
member.summary: Gets the element ID which acts as the paint server.
member.remarks: This field is used if the paint type is set to , , , or .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintAttribute.Color
member.summary: Gets the paint color.
member.remarks: This field is used if the paint type is set to , or .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintType
member.summary: Specifies the paint type for an SVG fill or stroke.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintType.None
member.summary: The fill or stroke is not rendered.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintType.Color
member.summary: A solid color is rendered.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintType.CurrentColor
member.summary: The current color (i.e., color from further up in the DOM) is rendered.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintType.Uri
member.summary: A paint server, defined by another element in the SVG document, is used.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintType.UriThenNone
member.summary: A paint server, defined by another element in the SVG document, is used. If the paint server reference is invalid, fall back to CanvasSvgPaintType.None.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintType.UriThenColor
member.summary: A paint server, defined by another element in the SVG document, is used. If the paint server reference is invalid, fall back to CanvasSvgPaintType.Color.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPaintType.UriThenCurrentColor
member.summary: A paint server, defined by another element in the SVG document, is used. If the paint server reference is invalid, fall back to CanvasSvgPaintType.CurrentColor.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute
member.summary: Object describing SVG path data.

remarks.p: Path data can be set as the 'd' attribute on a 'path' element.

The path data set is organized into two arrays:
The segment data array stores all numbers, and
the commands array stores the set of commands.
Unlike the string data set in the d attribute, each command in this representation uses a fixed number of elements in the segment data array. Therefore, the path 'M 0,0 100,0 0,100 Z' is represented as: 'M0,0 L100,0 L0,100 Z'. This is split into two arrays, with the segment data containing '0,0 100,0 0,100', and the commands containing 'M L L Z'.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.CreatePathGeometry
member.summary: Creates a path geometry object representing the path data.
member.remarks: A CanvasFilledRegionDetermination of CanvasFilledRegionDetermination.Alternate is used.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.CreatePathGeometry(Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Geometry.CanvasFilledRegionDetermination)
member.summary: Creates a path geometry object representing the path data, using the specified CanvasFilledRegionDetermination.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.GetCommands(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets commands from the commands array.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.GetSegmentData(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets data from the segment data array.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.RemoveCommandsAtEnd(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes commands from the end of the commands array.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.RemoveSegmentDataAtEnd(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes data from the end of the segment data array.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.SetCommands(System.Int32,Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand[])
member.summary: Sets new commands to the commands array.
member.remarks: Existing commands not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accomodate the new commands.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.SetSegmentData(System.Int32,System.Single[])
member.summary: Sets new commands to the segment data array.
member.remarks: Existing segment data not updated by this method is preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accomodate the new segment data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the CanvasSvgPathAttribute.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.Clone
member.summary: Creates a clone of this attribute value.
member.remarks: On creation, the cloned attribute is not set on any element.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.GetElement
member.summary: Returns the element on which this attribute is set.
member.remarks: Returns null if the attribute is not set on any element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.Device
member.summary: Gets the device with which this attribute is associated.
member.remarks: Attributes can only be assigned to elements which use the same device.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.Commands
member.summary: Gets the array of commands.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathAttribute.SegmentData
member.summary: Gets the array of segment data.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand
member.summary: Represents a path commmand.
member.remarks: Each command may reference elements from the segment data. Commands ending in Absolute interpret data as absolute coordinate. Commands ending in Relative interpret data as being relative to the previous point.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.ClosePath
member.summary: Closes the current subpath. Uses no segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.MoveAbsolute
member.summary: Starts a new subpath at the coordinate (x y).
member.remarks: Uses 2 floats of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.MoveRelative
member.summary: Starts a new subpath at the coordinate (x y).
member.remarks: Uses 2 floats of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.LineAbsolute
member.summary: Draws a line to the coordinate (x y).
member.remarks: Uses 2 floats of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.LineRelative
member.summary: Draws a line to the coordinate (x y).
member.remarks: Uses 2 floats of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.CubicAbsolute
member.summary: Draws a cubic Bezier curve (x1 y1 x2 y2 x y).
member.remarks: The curve ends at (x, y) and is defined by the two control points (x1, y1) and (x2, y2). Uses 6 floats of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.CubicRelative
member.summary: Draws a cubic Bezier curve (x1 y1 x2 y2 x y).
member.remarks: The curve ends at (x, y) and is defined by the two control points (x1, y1) and (x2, y2). Uses 6 floats of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.QuadraticAbsolute
member.summary: Draws a quadratic Bezier curve (x1 y1 x y).
member.remarks: The curve ends at (x, y) and is defined by the control point (x1 y1). Uses 4 floats of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.QuadraticRelative
member.summary: Draws a quadratic Bezier curve (x1 y1 x y).
member.remarks: The curve ends at (x, y) and is defined by the control point (x1 y1). Uses 4 floats of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.ArcAbsolute
member.summary: Draws an elliptical arc (rx ry x-axis-rotation large-arc-flag sweep-flag x y).
member.remarks: The curve ends at (x, y) and is defined by the arc parameters. The two flags 'large-arc-flag' and 'sweep-flag' are considered set if their values are non-zero. Uses 7 floats of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.ArcRelative
member.summary: Draws an elliptical arc (rx ry x-axis-rotation large-arc-flag sweep-flag x y).
member.remarks: The curve ends at (x, y) and is defined by the arc parameters. The two flags 'large-arc-flag' and 'sweep-flag' are considered set if their values are non-zero. Uses 7 floats of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.HorizontalAbsolute
member.summary: Draws a horizontal line to the coordinate (x).
member.remarks: Uses 1 float of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.HorizontalRelative
member.summary: Draws a horizontal line to the coordinate (x).
member.remarks: Uses 1 float of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.VerticalAbsolute
member.summary: Draws a vertical line to the coordinate (x).
member.remarks: Uses 1 float of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.VerticalRelative
member.summary: Draws a vertical line to the coordinate (x).
member.remarks: Uses 1 float of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.CubicSmoothAbsolute
member.summary: Draws a smooth cubic Bezier curve (x2 y2 x y)
member.remarks: The curve ends at (x, y) and is defined by the control point (x2, y2). Uses 4 floats of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.CubicSmoothRelative
member.summary: Draws a smooth cubic Bezier curve (x2 y2 x y)
member.remarks: The curve ends at (x, y) and is defined by the control point (x2, y2). Uses 4 floats of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.QuadraticSmoothAbsolute
member.summary: Draws a smooth quadratic Bezier curve ending at (x, y).
member.remarks: Uses 2 floats of segment data.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPathCommand.QuadraticSmoothRelative
member.summary: Draws a smooth quadratic Bezier curve ending at (x, y).
member.remarks: Uses 2 floats of segment data.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPointsAttribute
member.summary: Object describing an SVG points value in a polyline or polygon element.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgPointsAttribute.Points

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgStrokeDashArrayAttribute
member.summary: Object describing an SVG stroke-dasharray value.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgStrokeDashArrayAttribute.GetDashes
member.summary: Gets dashes from the array, ignoring unit mode.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgStrokeDashArrayAttribute.GetDashes(System.Int32,System.Int32,Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgLengthUnits[]@)
member.summary: Gets dashes from the array, along with their unit mode.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgStrokeDashArrayAttribute.RemoveDashesAtEnd(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes dashes from the end of the array.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgStrokeDashArrayAttribute.SetDashes(System.Int32,System.Single[])
member.summary: Sets dashes to the array.
member.remarks: Existing dashes not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accomodate the new dashes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgStrokeDashArrayAttribute.SetDashes(System.Int32,System.Single[],Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgLengthUnits)
member.summary: Sets dashes, and their unit mode, to the array.

remarks.p: This overload is for setting dashes which use one consistent unit mode. If the dashes have different unit modes, use .
Existing dashes not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accomodate the new dashes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgStrokeDashArrayAttribute.SetDashes(System.Int32,System.Single[],Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgLengthUnits[])
member.summary: Sets dashes, and their unit modes, to the array.

remarks.p: The number of dashes must equal the number of unit modes specified.
Existing dashes not updated by this method are preserved. The array is resized larger if necessary to accomodate the new dashes.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgStrokeDashArrayAttribute.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the CanvasSvgStrokeDashArrayAttribute.

member.summary: Creates a clone of this attribute value.
member.remarks: On creation, the cloned attribute is not set on any element.

member.summary: Returns the element on which this attribute is set.
member.remarks: Returns null if the attribute is not set on any element.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgUnits
member.summary: Defines the coordinate system used for SVG gradient or clipPath elements.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgUnits.UserSpaceOnUse
member.summary: The property is set to SVG's 'userSpaceOnUse' value.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgUnits.ObjectBoundingBox
member.summary: The property is set to SVG's 'objectBoundingBox' value.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgVisibility
member.summary: Specifies a value for the SVG visibility property.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgVisibility.Visible
member.summary: The element is visible.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Svg.CanvasSvgVisibility.Hidden
member.summary: The element is invisible.
member.remarks: Elements marked as Hidden will still have space allowed for them in the document, and their children are not affected.
